main.name: Keith MacKay
main.description: I have a wide range of experience with different technologies and development tools
main.bio: I am a dedicated developer with a passion for learning new things. I have taught myself most of the technologies that I know, just because I really enjoy learning new ways to do things. In my spare time, I like to explore all of the amazing breweries, restaurants, and food trucks in Durham with my girlfriend and our dog, Pepper
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me with any projects or offers via email, or through this contact form

additional.message: Not currently available for hire or freelance, but feel free to get in contact with me! Enjoy a picture of my dog

resume.skillMessage: Some of my strongest development skills and my confidence level with them

education.description: Studying Computer Science at NC State is what gave me the drive to teach myself as many technologies and languages that I could. I gained a great core understanding of Operating Systems and the general structures of programming languages

work.title: Lead Development Intern
work.description: Worked on C#.NET web application to meet requests from customers for Insurance Application behaviors, and helped develop a tool to detect and fix duplicate configurations in customer data to optimize build times

work.title: Software Configuration Specialist
work.description: Worked on converting Cloud Application to Locally Hosted instance to circumvent issues with customers that needed offline access. Worked with automated installations to make configuration easier for End-Users

work.title: Junior Software Engineer
work.description: Wrote Python Library for Blackbox Firmware Tests to assist Electrical Engineering Staff and some small Angular Applications to help manage ownership of test machines

work.title: Junior Software Engineer
work.description: Worked on GWT Application to show live traffic data to DOTs so that they can more quickly respond to traffic incidents. Used TS frameworks like D3 to show live traffic data and automatically adjust Variable Speed Limit (VSL) signs

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Working on Dockerized webapps in a Kubernetes environment for internal development tools. Supplying several different Applications as a Service to other teams, such as DNS, Binary Storage (Artifactory), and Source Control Management

projects.title: QR Code Generator
projects.subheader: Webpage that can convert URLs and Text into a QR Code

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.
